## Email

Contact Fred Feng at <fredfeng@umich.edu> to get in touch with us.

## Shipping Address

4901 Evergreen Rd, Dearborn, MI 48128 USA

## Getting Here

We are located in the HPEC building (Heinz Prechter Engineering Complex) Room 2200 at the University of Michigan-Dearborn.
There are bike racks next to the HPEC entrance on the John Montieth Boulevard side, and more bike racks on the west side (Chancellor's Pond side) of the Engineering Lab Building (1-minute walk to HPEC).
[Check here](https://umdearborn.edu/about-um-dearborn/visit-campus/parking-and-transportation/visitor-parking) for visitor vehicle parking.
